constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 132 (Wednesday, July 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. YOUNG:
H.R. 4783.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 and
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3
[Page H4251]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat certain tribal benefits and Alaska Permanent Fund dividends as earned income for purposes of the kiddie tax.
